name: TBGH simulator
description: TBGH simulator is a amaterous rpg gacha game which tells the stories or various Best GachaTubers. TBGH simulator is a game about everything what it stands to be a Best GachaTuber. The journey, the allies, the haters and the battles. Your goal is to become a succesful Best GachaTuber channel, but can't let your account get terminated! This game is planned to have a sequel.
